enable_ssh_bf: Enable this option to use the SSH brute-force tool on the target
ssh_bf_hostname: The IPv4 address of the target device in the SSH brute-force attack
ssh_bf_port: The port number to use in the SSH brute-force attack
ssh_bf_username: The username or absolute file path containing usernames to use in brute-force attack
ssh_bf_password: The password or absolute file path containing passwords to use in brute-force attack

enable_password_bf: Enable this option to use the 'enable' Password brute-force tool on the target
password_bf_hostname: The IPv4 address of the target device in the 'enable' brute-force attack
password_bf_port: The port number to use in the 'enable' brute-force attack
password_bf_username: The username to use in the 'enable' brute-force attack, needed to login
password_bf_password: The password to use in the 'enable' brute-force attack, needed to login
enable_password_wordlist: The absolute file path containing passwords to use in the 'enable' password attack
